Package com.petersamokhin.bots.sdk.callbacks.messages

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OnAudioMessageCallback
    Callback for message with some kind of attachments, or if message has no attachments
    OnDocMessageCallback
    Callback for message with some kind of attachments, or if message has no attachments
    OnEveryMessageCallback
    Callback for message with some kind of attachments, or if message has no attachments
    OnGifMessageCallback
    Callback for message with some kind of attachments, or if message has no attachments
    OnLinkMessageCallback
    Callback for message with some kind of attachments, or if message has no attachments
    OnMessageCallback
    Callback for message with some kind of attachments, or if message has no attachments
    OnMessageWithFwdsCallback
    Callback for message with some kind of attachments, or if message has no attachments
    OnPhotoMessageCallback
    Callback for message with some kind of attachments, or if message has no attachments
    OnSimpleTextMessageCallback
    Callback for message with some kind of attachments, or if message has no attachments
    OnStickerMessageCallback
    Callback for message with some kind of attachments, or if message has no attachments
    OnTypingCallback
    Callback will be called when user started typing
    OnVideoMessageCallback
    Callback for message with some kind of attachments, or if message has no attachments
    OnVoiceMessageCallback
    Callback for message with some kind of attachments, or if message has no attachments
    OnWallMessageCallback
    Callback for message with some kind of attachments, or if message has no attachments
